simple.escp.fill.function

Class AsciiFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.escp.fill.function.Function
      • simple.escp.fill.function.AsciiFunction

  • public class AsciiFunction
extends Function
    A built-in function that will return character based on ASCII number. To use this function, use the following expression: %{[number]}.

    Examples:

    To print character for ASCII code 127, use: %{127}.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from class: Function
        This method will called when starting a new fill job. It should clears or reset states of this function that should not be persistent across different fill jobs.
